# Working with genealogical data

`GedCom.jl` implements the genealogical concepts found in the GEDCOM lineage-linked grammar. The most important organizational structures in GEDCOM are the *individual* and the *family*.


- [genealogies](./genealogies.qmd): the `Genealogy` object is an entire GEDCOM data set.
- [individuals](./individuals.qmd): individuals in a `Genealogy`.
- [families](./families.qmd): family units in a `Genealogy`.
